analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily focus on the establishment, modification, or termination of councils, committees, and task forces within the Executive Branch. These entities are often created to advise the President on specific issues, coordinate efforts across different agencies, or address particular problems facing the nation. The documents outline the missions, functions, membership, and administrative details of these groups. The tone is generally formal and procedural, reflecting the nature of executive orders.
title: Executive Branch Advisory Groups: Formation, Modification, and Termination
